p: ER stress is not conducive to cell survival. Hypoxia activates the unfolded protein response, which adapts tumor cells to stress conditions, thereby increasing the malignancy of the cancer ( 43). In addition, ER stress serves an important role in cell apoptosis, autophagy and necroptosis-3 main cell programmed death pathways. Therefore, we hypothesized that XIAP serves a critical role in the regulation of programmed cell death in RCC cells.
